alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 06 at 9:21PM MST until November 07 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains, with the strongest gusts south of I-80, Tooele and Rush Valleys, Western Millard and Juab Counties and Southwest Utah. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. This includes I-80 from the Nevada border to Salt Lake City.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties
